title: Nam Ki-il
text:
Nam Ki-Il (born August 17, 1974) is a South Korean former <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player and current manager of <a href="Jeju%20United%20FC">Jeju United FC</a>.
Club career.
He played for <a href="Bucheon%20SK">Bucheon SK</a>, <a href="Jeonnam%20Dragons">Jeonnam Dragons</a>, <a href="Seongnam%20Ilhwa%20Chunma">Seongnam Ilhwa Chunma</a> and <a href="Cheonan%20City%20FC">Cheonan City FC</a>.
